thread.title: Greenlight Capital Inc Takes Share Stake In Twitter, Nordstrom

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Greenlight Capital Inc Takes Share Stake In Twitter, Nordstrom
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Greenlight Capital Inc:
* GREENLIGHT CAPITAL INC TAKES SHARE STAKE OF 2.8 MILLION SHARES IN TWITTER INC‍​
* GREENLIGHT CAPITAL INC TAKES SHARE STAKE OF 125,900 SHARES IN NORDSTROM INC
* GREENLIGHT CAPITAL INC CUTS SHARE STAKE IN GENERAL MOTORS BY 25.2 PERCENT TO 25.9 MILLION SHARES
* GREENLIGHT CAPITAL INC DISSOLVES SHARE STAKE IN HEWLETT PACKARD ENTERPRISE
* GREENLIGHT CAPITAL INC DISSOLVES SHARE STAKE IN KROGER * GREENLIGHT CAPITAL INC TAKES SHARE STAKE OF 139,000 SHARES IN SHUTTERFLY INC
* GREENLIGHT CAPITAL INC DISSOLVES SHARE STAKE IN RITE AID * GREENLIGHT CAPITAL INC DISSOLVES SHARE STAKE IN TEGNA INC
* GREENLIGHT CAPITAL INC TAKES SHARE STAKE OF 9.7 MILLION CLASS A SHARES IN ENSCO PLC
* GREENLIGHT CAPITAL INC DISSOLVES SHARE STAKE IN FRED‘S INC
* GREENLIGHT CAPITAL INC - CHANGE IN HOLDINGS ARE AS OF DEC 31, 2017 AND COMPARED WITH THE PREVIOUS QUARTER ENDED AS OF SEPT 30, 2017 (Source For the quarter ended Dec 31, 2017 bit.ly/2nZmLXw ) (Source For the quarter ended Sept 30, 2017 bit.ly/2nH0Owu )
